alert.note: Alert for Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 1:41PM PST until December 16 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM WEDNESDAY TO 10 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Periods of moderate to heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches along Highway 395 including Susanville, with 6 to 12 inches west of Highway 395 including Portola and near Lassen National Park. Wind gusts to 35 mph. * WHERE...Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM Wednesday to 10 AM PST Thursday. Heaviest snowfall rates between 4 PM and 10 PM Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Plan for delays, possibly significant. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening commute.
info.instruction: Even light snowfall causes major travel delays, especially during periods of high traffic volume. Be sure to allow extra time to reach your destination. Leave extra space between vehicles since it takes longer to stop on slick roadways. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
